contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} [[File:Naval Base Mariveles.jpg|250px|thumbnail|right|The entrance to Naval Base Mariveles after the fall of Bataan.]] '''Mariveles Naval Base''', in [[Mariveles, Bataan]], the Philippines, was used by the [[United States Navy|US Navy]]'s [[Asiatic Fleet]]. This base was located on the southern tip of the [[Bataan Peninsula]] and completed on July 22, 1941. ==See also== *[[Military History of the Philippines]] *[[Military History of the United States]] {{coord missing|Philippines}} [[Category:United States Navy bases]] [[Category:Military installations of the Philippines]] [[Category:Bataan]] {{WWII-stub}} {{USN-stub}}
